# Hello there! 👋

📚 Currently, I am pursuing a PhD in Autonomous Driving at [RobeSafe Research Group](https://www.robesafe.uah.es/index.php/es-es/) ([Universidad de Alcalá](https://uah.es)). My research is centered around developing **Deep Learning**-based techniques for enhancing Perception based on Automotive **RADAR** and **Camera** Fusion.

🗣️ I am always enthusiastic about collaborations and eager to engage in technical discussions, so feel free to reach out to me!

## Academic Background 📜

🚗 **Ph.D. Advanced Electronic Systems (2023-2027)**

Thesis: *Perception Techniques for Autonomous Driving based on Automotive RADAR and Camera Fusion*. **Currently ongoing**.

🏭 **M.Sc. Industrial Engineering (2021-2023)**

Thesis: *Deep Learning based 3D Object Detection for Automotive RADAR and Camera Fusion*. [View online](https://ebuah.uah.es/dspace/handle/10017/58111)


⚡ **B.Sc. Electronics and Automation Engineering (2017-2021)**

Thesis: *Multi-Object Tracking System based on LiDAR and RADAR for Intelligent Vehicles applications*. [View online](https://ebuah.uah.es/dspace/handle/10017/49532)


🤖 I was also a member of UAH Robotics Team for three years (2019-2022). We became the Champions of Eurobot Spain (April 2022) and we participated in the Eurobot International Finals in France (May 2022).
